Fun Fact: Males will fight each other to get to females.
Most Distinctive Feature: large brown-black claws with lighter-colored tips
Habitat: Near rocks, tide pools, and rocky marine areas.
Predators: Sand and kelp bass, other fish, seabirds, and sea otters.
Favorite Food: Worms, clams, mussels, other crabs, other invertebrates, and algae.
Name: Rock Crab
